name: 7th International Conference on Civil Engineering and Urban Planning
content: 7th International Conference on Civil Engineering and Urban Planning (CEU 2024) January 13-14, 2024, Virtual Conference https://ceu2024.org/ Scope 7th International Conference on Civil Engineering and Urban Planning (CEU 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications impacts and challenges of Civil Engineering and Urban Planning. The conference documents practical and theoretical results which make a fundamental contribution for the development of Civil Engineering and Urban Planning. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field. Original research papers, state-of-the-art reviews are invited for publication in all areas Civil Engineering and Urban Planning. Topics Of Interest • Civil Engineering Profession / Education • Construction Safety and Fire Engineering • Disaster Mitigation and Management • Earthquake Resistant Design Practices • Environmental Engineering & Management • Foundations in Problematic Soils • Geo-Environmental Engineering • GIS & Remote Sensing • Health, Safety and Environment • Infrastructure Engineering • Irrigation, Water Resources & Management • Modern Construction Materials • Retrofitting / Rehabilitation of Structures • Sustainable Development & Construction • Transportation Engineering & Traffic Planning • Urban Planning Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by January 06, 2024(Final Call). Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Civil Engineering and urban Planning: An International Journal (CiVEJ)(Confirmed). Selected papers from CEU 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • Civil Engineering and urban Planning: An International Journal (CiVEj) Important Dates Second Batch: (Submissions after November 18, 2023) • Submission Deadline : January 06, 2024(Final Call). • Authors Notification : January 10, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : January 12, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : ceu@ceu2024.org or ceuconfe@yahoo.com
